subtitle: Student & developer
about: I am a passionate and curious developer who believes technology should be built with purpose and care. I am always learning, welcoming challenges, and creating projects that reflect dedication and continuous growth.
tatakonDesc: Development project of a video game controller inspired by the design of the traditional Japanese drum Taiko no Tatsujin (“Tatakon”), using piezoelectric sensors integrated into a hardware and software system based on Arduino.
portfolioDesc: Portfolio developed using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript throughout the entire application. The project features smooth animations, a responsive design, internationalization (i18n) supporting English and Portuguese languages, and a dark mode for an enhanced user experience.
